hr_client module¶

hr_client.post_a_patient(info)¶

The client function of posting a new patient.

Parameters

info (dict) – the dictionary of patient’s information.

Returns

None

hr_client.post_ave_heart_rate_since(info)¶

The client function of posting a timestamp to get the interval average.

Parameters

info (dict) – the dictionary of patient’s information.

Returns

None

hr_client.post_heart_rate(info)¶

The client function of posting a new heart rate.

Parameters

info (dict) – the dictionary of patient’s information.

Returns

None

hr_client.request_on_ave_hr()¶

The client function of getting average heart rate of a patient

The result will be printed out.

Returns

None

hr_client.request_on_hr_list()¶

The client function of getting heart rate list of a patient

The result will be printed out.

Returns

None

hr_client.request_on_status()¶

The client function of getting heart rate status of a patient

The result will be printed out.

Returns

None

hr_client.test_add_patients()¶

Create a pseudo-list of patients information to add into the server and database.

The pseudo-list of patients contains error of: (1) wrong dictionary keys (2) invalid patient id (3) invalid patient email address (4) invalid patient age (5) update patient information for existing patient id Ultimately three valid patient information with the id of 5, 6, and 7.

Returns

None

hr_client.test_ave_hr_since()¶

Create a pseudo-list of time information to calculate the interval average heart rate.

The pseudo-list of patients contains error of: (1) wrong dictionary keys (2) invalid patient id (3) not exist patient id (4) invalid timestamp (5) no timestamp in database is ahead of given timestamp And one valid time information to calculate the interval average heart rate of id 5 since “2019-11-12 16:16:38.991052”.

Returns

None

hr_client.test_heart_rate()¶

Create a pseudo-list of patients heart rate information to add into the server and database.

The pseudo-list of patients contains error of: (1) wrong dictionary keys (2) invalid patient id (3) not exist patient id (4) invalid patient heart rate And nine valid patient hear rate information equally distributed with the id of 5, 6, and 7.

Returns

None
